mapper.select: SELECT prd_id as id, prd_nm as name FROM product
SELECT opt_id as opt_id FROM product_option where prd_id = #{itemId}

SELECT opt_id as opt_id, opt_color as opt_color, opt_size as opt_size, opt_height as opt_height, cd2.det_nm as OPT_COLOR_NM, cd3.det_nm as OPT_SIZE_NM, cd4.det_nm as OPT_HEIGHT_NM FROM product_option p JOIN code_detail cd2 ON p.opt_color = cd2.det_id JOIN code_detail cd3 ON p.opt_size = cd3.det_id JOIN code_detail cd4 ON p.opt_height = cd4.det_id where p.prd_id = #{prd_id}
